entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, playing Quidditch.

entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: A referee in the Quidditch game.

entities.name: bludger
entities.description: A type of ball used in Quidditch that is thrown by the Beaters to try and hit players or the Quaffle.

entities.name: quaffle
entities.description: The ball used in Quidditch to score points.

entities.name: broom
entities.description: A flying broomstick used by the players in Quidditch.

entities.name: umbrella
entities.description: An object used to protect oneself from rain.

entities.name: field
entities.description: The area where the Quidditch game is being played.

entities.name: mud
entities.description: A substance found on the ground after heavy rain.

entities.name: lightning
entities.description: A natural phenomenon that occurs during thunderstorms.

relationships.description: Harry came very close to being unseated by a Bludger.
Wood is the coach of Harry's team.
Madam Hooch called for a time-out in favor of Harry.
Wood is the coach of his team.
Harry huddled under a large umbrella with his team.
